Description:
ResponsibilitiesAnswer and direct phone calls
Act as first point of contact for visitors
booking appointment
Answering call
Responding to emails
Greeting patients
Checking patients out
Reappoint
Take payment
Diary management
Stock management
Administrative duties
Assisting other staff
Job Type: Full-timeSkills
Skills: The ideal candidate is a detail-oriented team player who will be the first point of contact for visitors at the office, greeting them in a polite and well-spoken manner. You will also be assigned duties as required (i.e. organization of inbound and outbound mail, administrative and general clerical support).
Experience: Reception/Front of House in Aesthetic Clinic: 1 year (Required)
Jumeirah: Reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (Required)
*** Applicant must be currently in UAE or Dubai ***
